name: node-machina-ffxiv
description: A wrapper for revahn's Machina network capture library.

scripts.postinstall: npm run unfirewall7 && npm run unfirewallXP
scripts.unfirewall7: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="MachinaWrapperJSON" dir=in action=allow program=./MachinaWrapper/MachinaWrapper.exe enable=yes
scripts.unfirewallXP: netsh firewall set allowedprogram ./MachinaWrapper/MachinaWrapper.exe MachinaWrapperJSON ENABLE

author: karashiiro
